GLOBAL_INSTRUCTIONS.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL_INSTRUCTIONS.instruction: Fill the form using BLACK INK and CAPITAL LETTERS only. Do not use correction fluid.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters

APP_DATE.title: Application Date
APP_DATE.instruction: Enter the date you are submitting this form (DD-MM-YYYY).

PERSONAL_DETAILS.title: Personal Details
PERSONAL_DETAILS.instruction: Enter your Full Name (as per ID proof), Date of Birth, Gender, and Marital Status.

BIRTH_DETAILS.title: Place & Country of Birth
BIRTH_DETAILS.instruction: Enter the City and Country where you were born.

FATCA_TAX_RESIDENCY.title: Tax Residency (FATCA)
FATCA_TAX_RESIDENCY.instruction: Fill this ONLY if you pay taxes in a country other than India. Enter the Country of Tax Residence and your Tax ID Number (TIN).
rejections: Tax resident of foreign country but TIN missing

FAMILY_DETAILS.title: Family Details
FAMILY_DETAILS.instruction: Provide at least ONE name: Father's Name, Spouse's Name, or Mother's Name.
rejections: All family name fields left blank

DISABILITY_STATUS.title: Disability / Special Status
DISABILITY_STATUS.instruction: Tick this box if you are differently abled, illiterate, or a senior citizen/incapacitated. If differently abled, specify the impairment type from the list on the last page.

IDENTITY_DOCS.title: Identity Documents
IDENTITY_DOCS.instruction: Enter your PAN Number (Mandatory) and Aadhaar Number. If you do not have a PAN, you MUST attach Form 60.
rejections: PAN missing and Form 60 not indicated

PERMANENT_ADDRESS.title: Permanent Address
PERMANENT_ADDRESS.instruction: Enter your address exactly as it appears on your Officially Valid Document (OVD). Tick the box for the document you are attaching (e.g., Passport, Voter ID).
rejections: Address does not match attached proof

CURRENT_ADDRESS.title: Current / Mailing Address
CURRENT_ADDRESS.instruction: If your current address is the same as your permanent address, tick 'Same as Above'. If it is different, fill in the new address and attach a 'Deemed OVD' (like a utility bill).
rejections: Address different but proof not attached
Address details missing when 'Same as Above' is unchecked

CONTACT_DETAILS.title: Contact Details
CONTACT_DETAILS.instruction: Enter your Mobile Number and Email ID. All bank alerts and OTPs will be sent here.

OCCUPATION_DETAILS.title: Occupation Details
OCCUPATION_DETAILS.instruction: Tick your Occupation type (e.g., Salaried, Self-Employed, Student). If Salaried, write your Corporate/Employer Name.
rejections: Company name missing for Salaried applicant

INCOME_DETAILS.title: Income Details
INCOME_DETAILS.instruction: Select your Source of Income (e.g., Salary, Business) and your Gross Annual Income range.

PEP_STATUS.title: Politically Exposed Person (PEP)
PEP_STATUS.instruction: Tick 'Yes' if you are a Politically Exposed Person (e.g., Senior Politician, Govt Official) or related to one. Otherwise, tick 'No'.

PRODUCT_SELECTION.title: Account Product Selection
PRODUCT_SELECTION.instruction: Tick the type of account you want to open (e.g., 'Savings', 'Senior', 'Salary').

DEBIT_CARD_REQ.title: Debit Card Request
DEBIT_CARD_REQ.instruction: Select 'Yes' if you want a Debit Card. Write the name you want printed on the card (Max 22 characters).
rejections: Yes selected but name on card missing

NOMINATION_DETAILS.title: Nomination Selection
NOMINATION_DETAILS.instruction: Select 'Yes' to add a nominee (recommended) or 'No' to decline. If Yes, fill the details below.

NOMINEE_INFO.title: Nominee Information
NOMINEE_INFO.instruction: If you selected 'Yes' for nomination, enter the Nominee's Name, Relationship, Date of Birth, and Contact Info.
rejections: Nomination is 'Yes' but Nominee Name missing

NOMINEE_GUARDIAN.title: Guardian for Minor Nominee
NOMINEE_GUARDIAN.instruction: If the nominee is under 18 (Minor), you MUST provide the name and address of an adult Guardian.
rejections: Nominee is minor but Guardian details missing

SWEEP_OUT_OPT.title: Sweep Out Facility
SWEEP_OUT_OPT.instruction: Tick this box if you want excess funds in your savings account to be automatically transferred to a Fixed Deposit to earn higher interest.

MARKETING_CONSENT.title: Marketing Consent
MARKETING_CONSENT.instruction: Select 'Yes' or 'No' to indicate if you want the bank to contact you for offers and products.

DECLARATION_SIGNATURE.title: Signature & Photograph
DECLARATION_SIGNATURE.instruction: Paste a recent colour photograph. Sign ACROSS the photograph and in the signature box below.

WITNESS_DETAILS.title: Witness Details
WITNESS_DETAILS.instruction: REQUIRED ONLY IF THUMB IMPRESSION IS USED. Two witnesses must sign and provide their details.
rejections: Thumb impression used but witness missing

BANK_USE_PAYMENT.title: Initial Payment Details (Bank Use)
BANK_USE_PAYMENT.instruction: Bank Official Use: Enter details of the initial deposit (Cash/Cheque amount and reference number).

BANK_USE_ONLY.title: For Bank Use Only
BANK_USE_ONLY.instruction: To be completed by bank officials for payment details, KYC verification, sourcing, certification, and approvals.
